item.title: IELTS Preparatory Workshop with UTAR-CEE
item.description:
Join IELTS Preparatory Workshop with UTAR-CEE and learn test techniques and strategies to achieve higher grades in IELTS!
Register now at: http://bit.ly/2hQoMEO
UTAR is an Authorised IELTS Test Registration Agent. Please register for IELTS test at Centre for Extension Education, UTAR Sungai Long Campus.
For enquiries on IELTS test registration and IELTS preparatory course, please contact: Ms Mohana at Tel: 603-9019 8088, Mobile: 016-223 3563, Fax: 603-9019 3880 or Email: mohanaselvi@utar.edu.my / cee@utar.edu.my

item.title: Certified Financial Planner (CFP) Certification Education Programme
item.fee: UTAR Students/Alumni : RM760 UTAR Staff/Public : RM999
item.description:
Enhance Your Career and Certify Your Skills with CFP Certification Education Programme!
Online registration: http://tinyurl.com/qbf6aq7
For enquiries and registration, please contact Ms Mohana at Tel: 603-9019 8088, Mobile: 016-223 3563, Fax: 603-9019 3880 or Email: mohanaselvi@utar.edu.my / cee@utar.edu.my
